question: 恋人
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>person</kanji> of <kanji>romance</kanji> is someone you do romancey things with. That person is your <vocabulary>lover</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is a bit strange. it's the two separate words <ja>恋</ja> and <ja>人</ja> put together, making the reading <ja><reading>こいびと</reading></ja>. Oooh lala. Two words coming together like two people coming together. Rawrs.
